Now includes dynamic (live) data to show status of charge points directly from the charge point networks [Beta].

Blue status codes indicate dynamic data - solid circle for Charging, blue cross for Available to use.

Launching dynamic data with POLAR network, with more networks and new features to follow in early 2017.

– Zap-Map 3.0 incorporates a major platform restructure to extend feature set and increase charge point loading time via faster APIs.
– Source London added as a new dynamic network partner
– Coverage now includes Republic of Ireland, as well as whole of UK
– Community area enhanced with new filters, cafe area and improved reply functionality
– Account section redesigned with editable display name, avatar, EV model and contact preferences
– New location type filter
– And many other small improvements…

* Share work point on Zap-Work network - for small businesses who would like to increase visibility of charge points with option to add peer to peer payment
* Taxi Use Only filter and app setting in preparation for TfL rapids rollout later in March
* Minor improvements and bug fixes

- Updated to reflect changes in data privacy laws, specifically the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
- More control of personal information you provide to Zap-Map including your contact preferences and device settings.

Reduced cache time on charge point info
Reduced cache time on charge point info
Reduced cache time on charge point info

We have added a 'Clear cache' button within the 'App settings' to help with troubleshooting problems.

We have also fixed the following bugs:

Users can now scroll if the sign-in button is hidden by the keyboard
Filter updates now occur more quickly for users who aren't signed in
Corrected the spelling of 'wind turbine'
Reduced the time taken to first open the app

Filter updates now occur more quickly for users who aren't signed in
Corrected the spelling of 'wind turbine'
Reduced the time taken to first open the app

We have made a number of improvements to the user interface as well as some minor adjustments to the Zap-Pay flow. In addition we have fixed a number of bugs in the following areas; filters, route planner and the 3rd party navigation app integration. We've also upgraded a number of internal libraries and improved the app monitoring.

We've also upgraded a number of internal libraries and improved the app monitoring.
